chart_description: The `k8s.cgroup.mem_usage_limit` chart displays the amount of RAM used by a container. It compares the amount of RAM available to the container against the amount of RAM actually used within those limits.

dimension_descriptions.available: This dimension displays the amount of memory available to the container in Mebibytes. If the container tries to use more memory than this limit, it will be terminated.
dimension_descriptions.used: This dimension displays the amount of memory actually used by the container in Mebibytes. If the used amount approaches or exceeds the available limit, it may indicate a memory leak or other issue in the container that requires investigation.
